page.home.button.run  call_flow   flow=demo
page.home.form.user  submit_form   record=User

Warnings:
- requires.missing: Page "home" has a form without requires. (enforced at runtime)
- copy.missing_intro_text: Page "home" has data-heavy content without intro text.
- copy.missing_page_title: Page "home" has no title.
